main event: A UFO sighting was reported on July 20, 1955, which involved a flash that turned off and on.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 15-20 minutes., There were multiple conclusions drawn about the sighting including balloon, aircraft, and astronomical explanations., The objects could not be located after an extensive search., The investigation was conducted by ATIC (Air Technical Intelligence Center)., There is reference documentation on file related to the case.
